description:
Verify that a user can install the Todo App as a Progressive Web App (PWA) for offline and desktop use.

Open the Todo App
Click the "Install App" option in the app menu/sidebar.
Review the installation prompt with app description and preview images.
Click the "Install" button.
Confirm that the app is added to your system as a standalone desktop/mobile application.
Open the installed app from desktop/start menu/app launcher and check functionality and offline access.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173 to launch the Todo App.
Access the app menu or sidebar and select the 'Install App' option to initiate installation.
Review the installation prompt that displays the app description and preview images.
Click on the 'Install' button on the installation prompt to confirm the installation.
Verify that the Todo App is added to your system as a standalone desktop or mobile application.
Launch the installed application from the desktop, start menu, or app launcher.
Check that the installed Todo App functions correctly, including offline access features.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm that the installation and functionality are working as expected.

description:
Verify that a user can successfully log out from the application and receives confirmation with secure session termination.

Click the user/avatar icon or open the main menu/sidebar.
Select the "Logout" option.
In the logout confirmation dialog, review any warning message (such as "Your tasks will not be saved").
Click the "Logout" button to confirm.
Observe that you are redirected to a logged-out state and see a feedback message (such as "You have been successfully logged out").

steps.stepDescription: Open a browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173
Click on the user avatar icon or open the main menu/sidebar to access user options
Select the Logout option from the menu
Review the logout confirmation dialog for any warnings like 'Your tasks will not be saved'
Click the Logout button within the confirmation dialog to proceed
Verify that you are redirected to a logged-out state and that a confirmation message appears indicating successful logout
Take a screenshot of the final screen to capture the successful logout confirmation
